titleStmt.title: A pleasant new northerne song. called the two York-shire lovers To a pleasant new court tune, or, the tune of Willy.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by E. Purslowe] for Iohn Wright,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and suggested publication date from STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
